talk_1013: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Take a look at this giant stone statue!
talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're lost, then go past this stone
statue.<sp:5:0:0> It should lead you to an
abandoned mine somewhere.
Keep loitering around here and you'll ruin
my ambush, so get moving.
talk_1014:
But you're not going to live long enough
to see any more of it,<sp:5:0:0> are you, Link?
talk_1044:
and <clr:0000>follow its line of sight<sp:5:0:0> to the next

talk_1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you stick around here, you'll get in the
way of my ambush.<sp:5:0:0> So leave. Now.
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>These stone statues have suspicious
written all over them.
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>From <clr:0000>stone statue<clr:ffff> to stone statue...<sp:5:0:0>
They really do form an unbroken <clr:0000>chain<clr:ffff>.
talk_1030:
